title: Radiative corrections to the Chern-Simons term at finite temperature in the noncommutative Chern-Simons-Higgs model
abstract: The one-loop radiative correction to the Chern-Simons coefficient is computed in noncommutative Chern-Simons-Higgs model at zero and at finite temperature. At high temperature, we show that the static limit of this correction is proportional to $TlogT$, in contrast with the commutative case, where it goes like $T$. Our results are analytic functions of the noncommutative parameter.
